thread.title: NAB, Vanguard and AustralianSuper take the honours in Blue Ribbon Awards
thread.title_full: NAB, Vanguard and AustralianSuper take the honours in Blue Ribbon Awards | afr.com

author: James Frost
title: NAB, Vanguard and AustralianSuper take the honours in Blue Ribbon Awards
text:
Luis Ascui by James Frost They are the best of the best. The winners of AFR Smart Investor 's flagship Blue Ribbon awards haven't just been selected by experts as excellent institutions, they have beaten a Melbourne Cup field of rivals in order to do so.
The competition for Bank of the Year, Fund Manager of the Year and Industry Super Fund of the Year and many more is extremely fierce and reflected in the high quality of products and services they produce.
To narrow the field we engage the help of research partners from Morningstar , Infochoice.com.au , Rice Warner , Lonsec Fiscal and Finder.com.au who finetune the criteria and help us choose the ultimate winners.
Lastly congratulations to all our winners and finalists. Many of these were extremely close-run competitions. To make it onto the podium is an achievement in itself.
Whether you are looking for a term deposit or a global bond fund, you'll find it right here in our list of Blue Ribbon Award winners for 2015.
AFR Smart Investor , in conjunction with our research partners, has studied the market to arrive at a definitive list of the best products and services around.
This year we've refined and introduced even more categories based on reader feedback. This year, you'll see awards for property loans, SMSF services and LICs alongside the ever popular margin loans and Australian equity funds.
Congratulations to all the winners (and readers who are already banking or investing with them). Choosing a great product or service can often be the hardest part of investing.
